overview:
Max Stiegemeier is an Internet Marketing Expert, Consultant, Trainer, Developer, Risk Taker, Avid Sky Diver and Venture Capitalist.

A technology consultant and innovator, Stiegemeier has been responsible for the growth of Fortune 500 companies and participated in the development of new web technologies with the advent of web 2.0.

An avid fan of extreme sports, Max Stiegemeier enjoys skydiving, cliff jumping, ZERO Gravity experiences and traveling the world in search of new and exciting opportunities.

He currently lives in Los Angeles and New York with his wife and children.
